consequences.title: What this implies
consequences.description: Here are the consequences of your current configuration.

microSeuilVente.title: Revenue threshold
microSeuilVente.description: Your annual revenue (excl. VAT) must not exceed â‚¬188,700 to remain under the micro-fiscal regime. Beyond this for 2 consecutive years, you automatically switch to the simplified real regime.

microSeuilService.title: Revenue threshold
microSeuilService.description: Your annual revenue (excl. VAT) must not exceed â‚¬77,700 to remain under the micro-fiscal regime.

microSeuilBnc.title: Revenue threshold
microSeuilBnc.description: Your annual revenue (excl. VAT) must not exceed â‚¬77,700 to remain under the micro-BNC regime.

microAbattementVente.title: 71% flat-rate deduction
microAbattementVente.description: A 71% deduction is applied to your revenue to determine your taxable profit. You cannot deduct your actual expenses.

microAbattementService.title: 50% flat-rate deduction
microAbattementService.description: A 50% deduction is applied to your revenue to determine your taxable profit.

microAbattementBnc.title: 34% flat-rate deduction
microAbattementBnc.description: A 34% deduction is applied to your revenue to determine your taxable profit.

microComptabilite.title: Simplified accounting
microComptabilite.description: You only need to keep a chronological receipts book. No mandatory balance sheet or income statement.

reelComptabilite.title: Mandatory accounting
reelComptabilite.description: You must maintain complete accounting: journal, ledger, annual inventory, balance sheet, and income statement.

reelDeficit.title: Carryforward deficit
reelDeficit.description: In case of deficit, you can carry it forward for 6 years and deduct it from your future profits.

reelCharges.title: Actual expenses deduction
reelCharges.description: You can deduct all your justified professional expenses: purchases, rent, insurance, travel expenses, etc.

socialMicro.title: Contributions on revenue
socialMicro.description: Your social contributions are calculated on your collected revenue at a flat rate. If revenue = â‚¬0, contributions = â‚¬0.

socialTns.title: Contributions on profit
socialTns.description: Your social contributions (~45% of profit) are calculated on your taxable profit. They are collected through provisional installments with annual adjustment. Minimum contributions are due even if profit = â‚¬0.

tvaFranchiseVente.title: VAT franchise thresholds
tvaFranchiseVente.description: You benefit from the franchise as long as your revenue remains â‰¤ â‚¬91,900. Beyond â‚¬101,000, you immediately lose the franchise.

tvaFranchiseService.title: VAT franchise thresholds
tvaFranchiseService.description: You benefit from the franchise as long as your revenue remains â‰¤ â‚¬36,800. Beyond â‚¬39,100, you immediately lose the franchise.

tvaFranchiseMention.title: Mandatory invoice mention
tvaFranchiseMention.description: You must indicate on your invoices: 'VAT not applicable, article 293 B of the General Tax Code'.

tvaFranchiseNoDeduction.title: No VAT recovery
tvaFranchiseNoDeduction.description: You cannot recover VAT on your purchases and investments.

tvaReelSimplifie.title: Simplified VAT declaration
tvaReelSimplifie.description: You must pay 2 semi-annual installments (July and December) and file an annual CA12 declaration. Note: this regime will be discontinued in 2027.

tvaReelNormal.title: Monthly VAT declaration
tvaReelNormal.description: You must file a CA3 declaration each month (or quarterly if VAT < â‚¬4,000/year).

alertMicroTvaReel.title: Atypical configuration
alertMicroTvaReel.description: You are under the micro-fiscal regime but subject to VAT. This is possible (if you exceed VAT franchise thresholds) but rare. Verify this is indeed your situation.

explanation.full: With MICRO regime, your entire turnover is the tax base. A flat-rate deduction is then applied to estimate your taxable profit.
explanation.benefitsOnly: With RÃ‰EL regime, only your actual profit (turnover minus actual expenses) is taxable.

explanation.full: With MICRO-SOCIAL regime, your contributions are calculated on your entire turnover at a flat rate.
explanation.benefitsOnly: With TNS CLASSIQUE regime, your contributions are calculated on your actual profit (turnover minus expenses).
